attributes.action: The majority of COVID-19 cases are at schools. Shut them down until it's safe.
attributes.additional_details: Thousands of people will become critically ill & cases won't stop rising if schools are left open. Children (especially young children) bring the virus home and could possibly infect vulnerable adults, or even they themselves could become seriously ill. We need to prevent this as soon as possible by closing schools.
attributes.background: COVID-19 cases are rising, majority of them being at schools. Shut schools down until it's safe to reopen them.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Keep schools closed until Covid 19 is no longer a threat: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316404
